I'm a long time lurker of the shrinking/giantess/foot fetish stories here and really got hooked on the "Tiny ___" genre of stories. I've gone through all the ones that I know of so I finally decided to register and contribute something back.

Plot:
You, Matthew Johnson, used to be a promising chemistry graduate student. Your group was working on a formula to shrink garbage and solve Earth's growing landfills problem when there was a lab accident: a fire destroyed all data on the formula, and the people exposed to the fumes all shrunk depending on how much they inhaled. Everyone else in the room shrunk into oblivion; you managed to get out early and "only" shrunk to two inches. The only other people affected only lost a few inches and, able to continue their normal lives, just took lawsuit settlements and went to live in the Bahamas.

After over a year of biological study of you, court proceedings, and other general mess, you regained full freedom over your life. Your settlement has been that the university will continue to house you in a special micro-apartment by yourself for as long as you like, and it continues to employ you as a tutor, although you only sign up for as many hours as you want. Special micro-electronics were designed for your use: a computer, megaphone (without which your voice is only barely audible), and little cart to drive around if you need to. Usually your neighbor, a normal residential advisor in a full-sized apartment, carries you around, though. Her name is Megan.

The shrinking process made you incredibly resilient, but not much more durable: heavy pressure can flatten you or work you into any shape much like putty. Your tiny body only needs nutrition (food, water) in the amount of about one gram per week. These were both unexplained side effects of the shrinking. Generally if you spend an amount of time deformed, you need one-tenth of that much time to reform.

Your case made you famous, and not harboring any ill will to the university, you let them use you as a kind of mascot for promotional materials. Now, though, you prefer keeping a low profile (heh), so your apartment is in an undisclosed location, and most students haven't met or seen you but only know that "that two inch tall dude" is around. Unfortunately, you were an only child, and your parents have both passed on, so your interactions are mostly with your neighbors, students, and some friends around your city.

Now you're 25 and more or less settled into your strange life. Enough explanation, let's begin!
